author: Tglanzer
title: Andrea (Dombroski) Redden
text:
NAUGATUCK ‚Äì Andrea D. (Dombroski) Redden, age 82, widow of Raymond E. Redden, passed away at her home on Monday, Dec. 18, 2023. Andrea and Ray were the epitome of opposites attract, devoted to each other for 40 years. They complimented each other through their life together, and all who love them are comforted knowing that they are together again.
Andrea was born in Waterbury on May 7, 1941, daughter of the late Zigmond and Sadie (Mis) Dombroski. She was raised in Beacon Falls and was a longtime Naugatuck resident. She was a member of Holy Saviour National Catholic Church.
Andrea was a dedicated community volunteer for many area organizations, a selfless caregiver for several family members and friends over the years, and a devoted mother who to this day is still referred to as ‚ÄúField Trip Mom‚Äù by students she chaperoned at Central Avenue School.
Her greatest joy was being a grandmother. She took special pleasure in giving them the treats their mom wouldn‚Äôt and having them join her while volunteering.
Andrea leaves her daughter Denise Walsh and her husband Christopher, of Naugatuck; her four grandchildren, Molly Walsh and her fiance Kyle Sorenson, Daisy Walsh, Abby Walsh and Daniel Walsh; her sister-in-law Julie Ann Dombroski; her niece Christine Jecko, with her husband Sean and their children Ann Elizabeth and Jonathan; her nephew Matthew Dombroski, with his wife Tori and their daughter Savannah Sadie Dombroski; and several cousins, nieces and nephews all of whom received greeting cards full of stickers for every occasion big and small ‚Äì no matter how old they got.
She was predeceased by her brother Rear Adm. John E. Dombroski.
She was blessed to be surrounded by a neighborhood of caring friends, old and new, who were quick to show her kindness and offer help frequently, despite her spirited insistence that she could still do it herself.
Her funeral will be on Friday, Dec. 29, 2023, at 11 a.m. at the Naugatuck Valley Memorial/Fitzgerald Zembruski Funeral Home, 240 N. Main St., Naugatuck. Burial will follow in Holy Saviour Cemetery in Naugatuck. Visitation will be on Friday from 10 to 11 a.m. at the funeral home.
To send an online condolence, please visit naugatuckvalleymemorial.com

author: Browns Alchemy
title: Browns rise in ranks after beating Jaguars
text:
The Cleveland Browns bounced back in Week 2 against the Jacksonville Jaguars. The offense looked more competent this week, and the defense shut down a potent Jaguars passing attack. The Browns played well last week, and much better than in their debut. The stats are starting to reveal how good the Browns are.
It must be stated that there‚Äôs nothing more important in data analytics than a large sample size. Football is considered a small sample size sport due to the lack of games compared to the other major sports leagues worldwide. Most football analytic experts believe teams need to play four to six games before we can identify trends.
Fans should appreciate the outliers in the data instead of reading the tea leaves. For example, the best two defenses in expected points added have both played the Carolina Panthers, who benched former number-one pick Bryce Young earlier this week. It‚Äôs important to keep stats in perspective during the early phases of the season.
NFL Tiers based on EPA ~~ Week 2 NFL Thread ~~
The Bills are good and the Panthers are not
(asterisk for the Chargers/Saints because they played the Panthers)
Look at Washington‚Äôs offense! pic.twitter.com/k0SjFeiAfj
‚Äî Computer Cowboy (@benbbaldwin) September 17, 2024
The Browns are hiding behind the Titans and Raiders on the line separating the second and third worse tiers. Series Results How hard it is to move the ball against each defense
(‚Äúplayed the Panthers‚Äù applies to Chargers/Saints here and ‚Äúplayed the Broncos‚Äù to Seahawks/Steelers) pic.twitter.com/YjJ6gd0BPa
‚Äî Computer Cowboy (@benbbaldwin) September 17, 2024
The Browns offense still failing to score points. Meanwhile, the Browns defense are one of the best at forcing teams to settle for field goals instead of touchdowns. QB Chart Quarterback grade and efficiency through Week 2
Malik Willis!
Not hard to guess who has been benched already pic.twitter.com/78l2OntGYX
‚Äî Computer Cowboy (@benbbaldwin) September 17, 2024
Pro Football Focus seem to think Deshaun Watson is playing much better than what his numbers indicate. Kevin Stefanski and the Browns are throwing the ball more than ever Pass rate on early downs when the game is close
Jim Harbaugh has been as advertised. Will be interesting to see how they do when they first have to play against a real team (KC week 4) pic.twitter.com/C5a89XQwYV
‚Äî Computer Cowboy (@benbbaldwin) September 17, 2024
Early Down Rushing and Passing efficiency How effective each team has been at rushing and passing on early downs
The elite Eagles passing offense as we've often said pic.twitter.com/LAHHEOFRXZ
‚Äî Computer Cowboy (@benbbaldwin) September 17, 2024
The Cleveland Browns are still trying to figure out their run game. Browns pass protection has been dominant Pass block grade of offensive linemen in true pass sets only (excludes plays with less than 4 rushers, play action, screens, short dropbacks and time-to-throws under 2 seconds) pic.twitter.com/uPzuvzBexb
‚Äî Computer Cowboy (@benbbaldwin) September 17, 2024

As always, lol good luck measuring run defense pic.twitter.com/4FoLyUVUTA
‚Äî Computer Cowboy (@benbbaldwin) September 17, 2024

(grain of salt for QB injury teams GB & MIA) pic.twitter.com/rHPNYvGufZ

author: @ElUniversal_SLP
title: Pacientes y personal del IMSS denuncian despido injustificado de m√©dico que alz√≥ la voz por falta de insumos
text:
Un grupo de pacientes y m√©dicos del IMSS se manifestaron en la Delegaci√≥n Estatal de San Luis Potos√≠ para exigir la reinstalaci√≥n del doctor Sim√≥n Almanza Mendoza, especialista en Traumatolog√≠a y Ortopedia, y la renuncia de la delegada Ang√©lica Cristina Rodr√≠guez Nester. Los manifestantes denunciaron irregularidades en la delegaci√≥n, como la falta de medicamentos y suministros , as√≠ como el maltrato a los pacientes. Esta protesta se suma a otras manifestaciones recientes en el IMSS, donde pacientes han denunciado la falta de medicamentos y la mala atenci√≥n m√©dica.
Pacientes del doctor Sim√≥n Almanza exigen su regreso al IMSS, a quien calificaron como un m√©dico "muy capacitado y humano" que fue injustamente expulsado.
Nuevos impuestos en SLP 2025: ¬øQu√© dice el gobierno estatal al respecto?
Seg√∫n ellos, su √∫nico "delito" fue denunciar la falta de medicamentos e insumos necesarios para realizar cirug√≠as, especialmente en ni√±os que requieren atenci√≥n urgente.
Almanza Mendoza revel√≥ que su destituci√≥n se debi√≥ a su insistencia en que la instituci√≥n proporcionara los materiales y recursos necesarios para tratar a sus pacientes. Tambi√©n, denunci√≥ que la delegada Ang√©lica Cristina Rodr√≠guez lo someti√≥ a acoso laboral.
El doctor Sim√≥n Almanza Mendoza lament√≥ que fue removido de su cargo por haber exigido los recursos y presupuesto necesarios para realizar cirug√≠as urgentes a sus pacientes.
Delegado del Bienestar llama a que se esclarezca caso de asesinato del alcalde de Tancanhuitz
‚ÄúLamentablemente, por tratar de denunciar que no hay recursos para las cirug√≠as de los ni√±os, fui notificado el d√≠a martes 17 de mi destituci√≥n como ortopedista del hospital. Me interesa que tengamos recursos para atender a los ni√±os, que tengamos implantes, tornillos y clavos‚Äù, explic√≥ Almanza.
As√≠ mismo, los derechohabientes denunciaron que hay pacientes que han estado esperando durante meses, en algunos casos hasta seis, para recibir cirug√≠as que no se han realizado debido a la falta de material y medicamentos.
Entre tensi√≥n y protestas, morenista Gloria Guadalupe Felipe es electa alcaldesa de Tancanhuitz
Ante esta situaci√≥n, los derechohabientes han estado protestando de manera constante para exigir la reinstalaci√≥n del doctor Almanza Mendoza, la soluci√≥n a la escasez de medicamentos e insumos, as√≠ como la remoci√≥n de los funcionarios que catalogaron como ‚Äúcorruptos o ineficientes‚Äù.
